content.text:
# 2002 President's Cup – Singles

Marat Safin
| champ    =  Yevgeny Kafelnikov
| runner   =  Vladimir Voltchkov
| score    = 7–6(8–6), 7–5
| edition  =
| type     = singles doubles
| after_year = no
}}
Marat Safin was the defending champion but lost in the quarterfinals to Paradorn Srichaphan.
Yevgeny Kafelnikov won in the final 7–6(8–6), 7–5 against Vladimir Voltchkov.
Seeds
A champion seed is indicated in bold text while text in italics indicates the round in which that seed was eliminated.
Marat Safin (quarterfinals)
#  Tommy Haas (quarterfinals)
#  Yevgeny Kafelnikov (champion)
#  Rainer Schüttler (first round)
# Paradorn Srichaphan (semifinals)
# Ivan Ljubičić (quarterfinals)
# Mikhail Youzhny (second round)
# Davide Sanguinetti (semifinals)
}}
